infos.title: New Update System
texts: This dialog helps you to not miss any new features when Puppeteer updates

infos.title: New features
texts: - Colonist Bar contains visual connection status and last command issued
- Right click in the Colonist Bar now shows an assignment menu
- Settings! You can now configure Puppeteer in the Mod Settings

infos.title: Bug fixes
texts: - Puppet Announcer now always on top. That makes it compatible with Dubs Mini Map
- Viewers are no longer automatically unassigned

infos.title: New features
texts: - New connection indicator that shows possible network congestions

infos.title: Bug fixes
texts: - Puppet head does not get stuck anymore
- Communication runs now in a background thread to avoid network congestions
- Less risk for internal concurreny that leads to undefined state
- Better rendering of the static in the colonist bar

infos.title: Create new colonists
texts: You can now spawn new Colonists that are automatically assigned to a viewer with the new button in the top right corner of the screen. If you have Prepare Carefully, you can even add cloth and weapons

infos.title: Bug fixes
texts: - Connection indicator shows average send time for slow connections
- Colonist bar spacing with multiple rows
